item.title: Massive dip appearing in the road, 8th September
item.description:
As I drove home today, I noticed a very large square shaped dip forming in the road surface. Concerned this could be something quite serious, especially with the amount of heavy vehicles who use the road. Location marked is approximate as was driving, but from memory was as the road slopes downwards as you head into Slade Green from Erith.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 101, Manor Road, Slade Green, Erith, London
Report on FixMyStreet
